00018 class Function;

00020 namespace UI {
00021 
00022     class View {
00023         class FunctionNotSupportedException: public std::runtime_error {
00024             public:
00025                 FunctionNotSupportedException(const std::string &what):
00026                     std::runtime_error(what) { }
00027         };
00028 
00029         public:
00030             View(): numFrames(1), numLoops(1) { }
00031 
00033 
00035             template <typename T>
00036                     void setParameter(const std::string &parmName, const T &value) {
00037                 ApplyChanges(ParameterMap(parmName, value));
00038             }
00039 
00040             virtual void applyTransform(const VecMath::Rotation<4> &R,
00041                                         const VecMath::Vector<4> &T) = 0;
00042 
00043             virtual void ObjectHypercube() = 0;
00044             virtual void ObjectHyperpyramid() = 0;
00045             virtual void ObjectHypersponge() = 0;
00046             virtual void ObjectGasket() = 0;
00047 
00048             virtual void setFunction(Function *) = 0;
00049 
00050             virtual void setdR(const VecMath::Rotation<4> &_dr) = 0;
00051 
00052             virtual void setNumFrames(unsigned _numFrames) { numFrames =_numFrames; }
00053             virtual void setNumLoops(unsigned _numLoops) { numLoops =_numLoops; }
00054 
00055             virtual void animate() = 0;
00056 
00057             virtual void setImgDir(const std::string &) = 0;
00058             virtual void setImgPrefix(const std::string &) = 0;
00059 
00060             virtual void setSize(unsigned, unsigned) = 0;
00061 
00062             virtual void setColors(bool) = 0;
00063             virtual void setShading(bool) = 0;
00064             virtual void setLighting(bool) = 0;
00065             virtual void setTransparence(bool) = 0;
00066             virtual void setWireframe(bool) = 0;
00067             virtual void setFog(bool) = 0;
00068             virtual void setHyperfog(bool) = 0;
00069             virtual void setCoordinates(bool) = 0;
00070             virtual void setBackground(const Color &) = 0;
00071             
00072         protected:
00073             virtual void ApplyChanges(const ParameterMap &) = 0;
00074 
00075             virtual unsigned getNumFrames() { return numFrames; }
00076             virtual unsigned getNumLoops() { return numLoops; }
00077             virtual void setDefaultBackground() {
00078                 static Color defaultBackground(0.1, 0.1, 0.1, 1.0);
00079                 setBackground(defaultBackground);
00080             }
00081 
00082         private:
00083             unsigned numFrames;
00084             unsigned numLoops;
00085     };
